website_summaries.verdict: The "Rolls Royce" of car batteries. You pay a lot, but you get what you pay for.
pros: A powerhouse battery that is suitable for race cars, luxury vehicles, and everything in between
cons: On the higher end of the pricing spectrum

customer_reviews.title: recharge to 100% since regular alternator wont charge all the way unless you drive long ways
customer_reviews.text: I have this battery’s to solve my dimming lights and they work well rest on 13.3 after drive and drop to 13.1 after couple days of no use i run about 2800 rms .5 Ohms set up some times off road with 7 alogen fog lights and the headlights at no problem
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: Using this currently to power a 2300 rms watt Skar Audio amp and a 12" Sundown DV2 with no issues. My old stereo system (first 1) was 2 12" Alpine Type-R's only on an 1100 watt amp. The Reikken battery I bought from the shop that installed every thing just didn't cut it. My headlights would dim every time the bass hit in my Yukon. Then, when I got this battery, it fixed all issues. My original D3400 battery was given to my dad which uses it in the back of his van for work, he says he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I have a Skar 1500 and this battery supplies all the juice it needs. I don’t play the music with the truck not running but so far so good. I’ve checked it multiple times and I still have over 12.6 volts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Legg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and output!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and output of this battery! Couldn’t have done the build without it! No more dimming when the bass hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture is Misleading Please look at the PDF
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you open the PDF to the battery. I made the mistake of going off the photos which are entirely wrong. First off this is a TOP mount and not a side. Sure you can order the I-Bar to make it a side mount. Also the picture shows the positive and negative on the wrong side. They are actually swapped which totally hoses me. I honestly didn't see anything in the description and I missed the PDF. Don't make my mistake. I hope I can get this to work somehow because I hear great things about the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Beck

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Performance
customer_reviews.text: I was able use this battery to play my car audio sound system for a backyard party for 5 hours without running the vehicle engine. The system consisted of a Hifonics BXX4000 playing 2 Sundown SA 15's, 2 Hifonics Zeus Elite 2000.4 playing 8 Audiopipe 8's and 1 Hifonics BXX 800.4 playing 8 Audiopipe Tweeters. The system never clipped once for a power or voltage drop. This is an amazing battery that I recommend as I am totally impressed by its performance.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Camry Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the stock battery in my 2014 Toyota Camry Hybrid. It was a better value than the Toyota battery. The battery size/style that comes with the car was only available through the dealer. I purchased this one to give it a try and it worked with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: DCblackhole

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: 1st battery lasted 5.5 years. Here’s to another 5.5! Only battery I’ll run with my system.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: got 3  read the rest
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 for car audio system each battery came in its own shipping box , they used foam as packaging which went everwere im still cleaning it up.. what a mess.. each battery was 12.75 volts so no need to charge them , straight into trunk still not finished with build but im likeing what i see so far
customer_reviews.author: erol

customer_reviews.title: It came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Battery came damaged as delivered the box was mangled looked like it was in a roll over accident Also wasn’t that pleased with it I thought it would help stable my voltage drop with one 12” sub and high amp alt with big 3 upgrade and all zero gauge wire but nope it didn’t these battery’s are way over prices will stick with the red tops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product in quality and etc
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product in quality and etc. I would say buy the charger as I did just in case your battery isn't fully charged. However after liretrally 2 minutes on the charger it was fully done.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.X

customer_reviews.title: battery swell ?
customer_reviews.text: charged it to 13.3v with agm battery charger before use. battery started to swell after 2 days of use. amazon wont let you return. makes me sad.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: great battery charges like a charm running a lot of juice through it daily and works wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, nice price!
customer_reviews.text: This battery works perfectly for my needs. I have it powering about 4K watts and it handles it like a champ! Minimal to no lights dimming when the bass hits!
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love these Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I Have a 2008 Honda Civic Coup and this just barely fits! I might get a smaller XS and move this to the truck once I do more to my system. I have a Sound Qubed HDS312 on a Hifonics 1800 Zues with Zero power issues. Even with Kickers in the doors, dash (tweets), and rear all on a CX300.4. Stock Alt with the big 3. Love these Batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L Beaver

customer_reviews.title: This battery is hard to beat. Well worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: This battery is hard to beat. Well worth the price. I went dual battery and will be replacing my old old battery with another XS.
customer_reviews.author: EandM

customer_reviews.title: Xs powers products are the truth
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery! When I went to the guys at AutoZone to check the voltage they were so amazed at the power rateings. Never seen anything like it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Better then Optima battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery great best battery I bought didn't let me down in cold weather (-40 °f). Can't wait to custom sub box
customer_reviews.author: Lil Middwest

customer_reviews.title: worth the pesos bro!
customer_reviews.text: Truck starts quicker and smoother, lights don't dim when subs hit. Great battery! Had to do a slight modification. To make it fit. Nothing a little grinding and a hammer couldn't fix
customer_reviews.author: Coltan A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass
customer_reviews.text: This battery is top notch best battery I've owned I have a winch, flood lights 8k subwoofer system all connected to this battery and it's still solid haveng had no problems
customer_reviews.author: nicholas matthew serna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great battery for car audio it even reads over 12 volts when fully charged without a load on it.
customer_reviews.author: adam jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you need an extra battery you can't go wrong xs is the ....!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Laurichesse

customer_reviews.title: all your base belong to us
customer_reviews.text: What's to say that hasn't been said? XSPower batteries rock.
customer_reviews.author: Xtremission LLC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I needed and more showed up on time
customer_reviews.author: lathaniel williams

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Price was great as well. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend xs batteries truck is starting without any problems. Running about 2500 rms system and it is giving me all the power I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous power! I am running 2 of these and have no power issues at all. Nothing more to say.... it is perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Enterpriser Suite

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Came in great shape. Packaged well. Product works just like it's supposed too! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Colbyjack

customer_reviews.title: Its A GO!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this to replace my optima yellow top and this makes the optima battery look like a Duracell battery. I also ordered the side mounts, which were easy to install. This has more juice than you will ever need and i highly recommend this to anyone who has a serious system or getting started on one. This Is A GO!!
customer_reviews.author: 3G SpeeD

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Source
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome power source for my two Alpine MRX-M110 amps running at 2 ohms each pushing two RE Audio SEXV2-12D4. Don't have them turned all the way up. Running 2GA wire to the truck for power transfer from the alternator and works great. All in a 2006 Chevy Impala.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Vela

customer_reviews.title: No more headlight dimming
customer_reviews.text: Added this to the back of my ford fusion 2010 with its stock alternator(150 amps). It's currently feeding a hifonics brx3016.1d connected to a sundown x12 rev2. No problems even on full tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Cream Monster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good battery i just need to do a big 3
customer_reviews.author: javier rodelo

customer_reviews.title: Big power for big system
customer_reviews.text: Strong battery , difinitely does the job , solved the dimming lights or my cause shutting off my lights due to lack of power output , would gladly suggest to anyone who is looking for a good battery for a big system !!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Xs power d3400 warehouse deal for $218.00 for a $260.00 item! Just a little packing damage, battery was excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Another xs power d3400 to go with my other one to have a dual xs power battery bank in my silverado. Bought a warehouse deal and came in perfect condition. Styrofoam was a little banged up, but i'll do that anytime for $40.00 off the total price. Works perfect! Thank you Amazon for helping costumers find the deals they hope for and treating me right! Awesome battery!! No lights dimming now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big heavy beast.
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem at first, but Amazon has great customer service! Requires knowledge with float charges to get the best performace. Charge it first before slapping it in a vehicle. It will never reach its potential unless it's conditioned first with a smart charger, not an alternator. Then you have a monste!
customer_reviews.author: RegisS

customer_reviews.title: awesome battery
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my system I use it as my main battery pushing two jl audio 12 w7 with a 2500 skar amp on my subs excellent battery better than the yellow top optima I had
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Gerard Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: It fixed my issue with dimming interior lights! 105amp alternator, Big 3 on 1500w rms and it takes it like a champ, never dropping below 12.7v full tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Big A

customer_reviews.title: Just Wow... Need a battery isolator and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just Wow... Need a battery isolator and a new alternator now...... Impressive on my 2400 watt 2014 brx brutus. ..
customer_reviews.author: Cross, N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery, works really good, and lasts forever. Liked the first one so I ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Buyer

customer_reviews.title: 2011 F150 Ecoboost Upgrade w/ 1200watt inverter
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the stock battery that came with my 2011 F150 SCREW XLT Ecoboost. This thing lasts FOREVER using my 1200 watt peak inverter, even when the truck is off. The truck starts easier and everything seems to have more juice then it used to. I am planning on adding a sound system and a JL stealthbox for the rear seats. This Battery is just a hair smaller than the stock, so I had to use the padding on the original battery to squeeze it into the locking bracket. Buy a large and small post if you have a 2011 F150.
customer_reviews.author: Battle Tested Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This battery is a perfect fit in my 2011 Sierra. It works like a dream along with my soundqubed 2200.2 amp.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Getting the batteries was an ordeal due to some port strike(they're made overseas). 1 battery started leaking 1 year after and the warranty was not replaced under warranty because "Without a visible leak, there isn’t going to be much I can do as far as warranty." but I couldn't take off the stickers to show them where the leak is because it would "void" warranty. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo M.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This product has exceeded my expectations. I bought the xpower 3400 to prevent my lights from dimming and to add power to my bass.
customer_reviews.author: David Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Best Batter for my 2005 Dodge Ram 1500 5.7L Hemi
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2005 Dodge Ram 1500 5.7L Hemi, I like the way it runs my Alpine radio, apps, fog light with no glitches. Totally Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Scrat

customer_reviews.title: Best battery money can buy. XS Power D3400
customer_reviews.text: Best battery money can buy. Extremely happy. I replaced my Kinetik battery HC1800 with XS Power D3400 much better battery. I have 615 inch subwoofer's kicker CRV. 280 amp alternator. Really sounds awesome. I highly recommend this battery to anyone who wants good power. You can really push it hard. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Battery Ever this is the 4th one of these batteries 2 in my Tahoe, 1 in Mitsubishi Eclipse and 1 in my 73 Camaro Muscle car with a big block! has no prblem running 2400W RMS stereo full out! you need this for car stereo beef ups
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: look long to arrive but like the product well worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: magic ruiz

customer_reviews.title: SS hungry
customer_reviews.text: one bad ass battery iv had it for a min now it helps with the SS kindaa haa great batt tho
customer_reviews.author: impala fexin

product_meta.title: XS Power D3400 XS Series 12V 3,300 Amp AGM High Output Battery with M6 Terminal Bolt

Spill proof, sealed, valve regulated and vibration resistant
Ultra low internal resistance, mount in almost any position
